feed.title: This thread is not about the soft/hard fork technical debate

entry.title: This thread is not about the soft/hard fork technical debate
entry.summary: In this context, Sergio denies using any four-letter words on IRC and questions the trustworthiness of IRC IDs. He also requests Venzen to provide a link where an impostor said something to him in Sergio's name. Sergio expresses his skepticism towards the characters mentioned in the email and considers them as just regular people. He signs off with best regards.
